notes.body: Hello Kiran Sankar Ghosh,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is in reference to your order #653996117716377600-95494.  As per the update received on your concern, please note that a return has been raised for 'JOINTACE TRIO STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES - 1 Quantity on Dec 3, 2025. The medicines will be picked up by the pickup boy within 48 hours from the day the return is raised. As soon as the medicine is collected and verified by the partner retailer, the refund will be initiated within 3-5 days. Post initiation, the refund amount will be credited to your pe wallet (refund cash) within 24-48 hrs.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Kiran Sankar Ghosh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in reference to your order #653996117716377600-95494.

As per the update received on your concern, please note that a return has been raised for 'JOINTACE TRIO STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES - 1 Quantity on Dec 3, 2025. The medicines will be picked up by the pickup boy within 48 hours from the day the return is raised. As soon as the medicine is collected and verified by the partner retailer, the refund will be initiated within 3-5 days. Post initiation, the refund amount will be credited to your pe wallet (refund cash) within 24-48 hrs.

We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello Ramji,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654182772494802944-26151, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 02nd December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body_html: Grievance – Order #654155406502502400-93481 - medicine unavailability

notes.body: Hello Gopal,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We understand your concern in regard to order #654155406502502400-93481.       We are extremely sorry to inform you that your order has been cancelled due to the unavailability of the medicines. Please note that we show the "out of stock" tab only when the item is not able to be arranged through us. The medicine MIXTARD 30 HM PENFILL CARTRIDGE OF 3ML SUSPENSION FOR INJECTION is currently not in stock with our partner retailer. Our partner retailer tried to arrange it from other distributors; however, it was not successful. We assure you that this shortfall in your order would have occurred only if the partner retailer had exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.      There is a possibility that the required medicine was in stock at the time of placing the order. However, due to the high inflow of orders, the partner retailer has exhausted the stock of this particular medicine. Please note that the reason for this shortfall is the generic unavailability of this particular medicine with our partner retailer or other retailers in the vicinity.      We have highlighted with our partner retailer to check its further availability. We will notify you once we get a further update. Please do not place a new order for the item until we update you. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.    Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Gopal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand your concern in regard to order #654155406502502400-93481.  

We are extremely sorry to inform you that your order has been cancelled due to the unavailability of the medicines. Please note that we show the "out of stock" tab only when the item is not able to be arranged through us. The medicine MIXTARD 30 HM PENFILL CARTRIDGE OF 3ML SUSPENSION FOR INJECTION is currently not in stock with our partner retailer. Our partner retailer tried to arrange it from other distributors; however, it was not successful. We assure you that this shortfall in your order would have occurred only if the partner retailer had exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. 

There is a possibility that the required medicine was in stock at the time of placing the order. However, due to the high inflow of orders, the partner retailer has exhausted the stock of this particular medicine. Please note that the reason for this shortfall is the generic unavailability of this particular medicine with our partner retailer or other retailers in the vicinity. 

We have highlighted with our partner retailer to check its further availability. We will notify you once we get a further update. Please do not place a new order for the item until we update you. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime. 

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

Dear PharmEasy Support Team,
I am writing to formally bring to your attention that the refund for my order placed on 21st November 2025 has not been received, despite the status on my PharmEasy account indicating that the amount has been credited.
As per the payment breakdown:

  *
Original amount: ₹1,476.30
  *
Amount charged after Amazon Pay discount: ₹1,436.30
  *
Payment debit date: 22nd November 2025

The expected refund timeline communicated was until 29th November; however, today is 2nd December, and no refund has been reflected in my bank account.
To verify the same, I have:

  1.
Reviewed my bank statement (attached for the period 21st November to 2nd December),
  2.
Contacted Amazon Pay support, and
  3.
Checked with Union Bank support,

All of whom have confirmed that no refund has been received or is pending in relation to this transaction.
Given that the amount has been debited and the refund is overdue, I kindly request your immediate assistance in resolving this matter at the earliest.
Your prompt intervention would be sincerely appreciated, as the delay has already exceeded the communicated timeframe.
Thank you for your attention and support.

Shephali Sood

9882218888

Shimla-1

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I had ordered a product on 20 November 2025 with order id -
650402234853142528. But in this i received totally wrong product with
different company and that too with open seal product box. So due to this i
filed return request for the same. On 26 november 2025 return order was
picked up successfully. But till now also my refund is not processed.
Firstly the wrong product was delivered and then the refund is being
delayed by saying that the refund will take more days and after the product
reach to them.

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Complaint regarding the refund for the order id - 650402234853142528
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
I had ordered a product on 20 November 2025 with order id - 650402234853142528. But in this i received totally wrong product with different company and that too with open seal product box. So due to this i filed return request for the same. On 26 november 2025 return order was picked up successfully. But till now also my refund is not processed. Firstly the wrong product was delivered and then the refund is being delayed by saying that the refund will take more days and after the product reach to them. 
Return was successfully reached to the seller yesterday itself. But still I had not received any information on processing of refund. You should understand the customer problem as well. If it already reached to seller refund must be processed. 
Everytime I sent complaint regarding this only response I get is refund will take 5 days. But first you say it takes time to reach seller then after reaching to them again 5 days is asked. Is it fair that the customer who pay for the product but then for wrong product received he had to wait for 10 to 15 days. 

 Order id - 650402234853142528 Transaction id - T2511201235324232953202

I had multiple times raised this complaint to customer service with ticket id - 22231676, 22233225, 22240350.
I also raised complaint on National consumer helpline also with grievance id - 8256261.

Thank you

notes.body: Hello ​Avneet,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653323872101728256-75376, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.     Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description:
To the most shameless officer

This email serves as a formal notice regarding the repeated failure to
deliver my parcel and the continued misrepresentation of the delivery
status on your application.

Despite multiple complaints and your assurance that the delivery would be
completed yesterday—and again today—the tracking information has once more
been updated with the incorrect remark “consignee unavailable.” I have
verified with my society’s security personnel and reviewed CCTV footage; no
delivery attempt was made on either days.

Additionally, I have contacted the courier company over email, who has
confirmed that no such parcel was handed over to them for delivery.

As discussed with you during our call yesterday, due to the continued
negligence, misinformation, and failure to resolve the issue, I am
compelled to proceed with the following actions:

   1.

   *Filing a formal complaint with the local police* regarding the repeated
   misrepresentation and potential mishandling of the parcel.
   2.

   *Initiating legal proceedings* against the company and responsible
   personnel through the Consumer Court, and if required, through the Hon’ble
   Bombay High Court.
   3.

   *Escalating this matter to your company’s senior management*, including
   the CEO, along with supporting documentation of all communications and call
   recordings.
   4.

   *Sharing verified information regarding this incident* on social media
   and with other affected consumers who have contacted me over the past few
   days.
   5.

   *Forwarding relevant communication and evidence to media outlets*,
   should the matter remain unresolved.

I emphasize that my concerns relate not only to the non-delivery but also
to the serious implications this delay poses, given that the parcel
pertains to a health-related matter.

While I do not seek an informal settlement at this stage, I expect an
immediate and formal response from your side acknowledging this complaint
and providing clarity on the next steps.

Please treat this matter as urgent.

Sincerely,


Kais Kazi

--

and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is

you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any

permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return 
e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Formal Notice of Complaint Regarding Non-Delivery and Misrepresentation
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
To the most shameless officer 
This email serves as a formal notice regarding the repeated failure to deliver my parcel and the continued misrepresentation of the delivery status on your application.
Despite multiple complaints and your assurance that the delivery would be completed yesterday—and again today—the tracking information has once more been updated with the incorrect remark “consignee unavailable.” I have verified with my society’s security personnel and reviewed CCTV footage; no delivery attempt was made on either days.
Additionally, I have contacted the courier company over email, who has confirmed that no such parcel was handed over to them for delivery.
As discussed with you during our call yesterday, due to the continued negligence, misinformation, and failure to resolve the issue, I am compelled to proceed with the following actions:
  1. Filing a formal complaint with the local police regarding the repeated misrepresentation and potential mishandling of the parcel.
  2. Initiating legal proceedings against the company and responsible personnel through the Consumer Court, and if required, through the Hon’ble Bombay High Court.
  3. Escalating this matter to your company’s senior management, including the CEO, along with supporting documentation of all communications and call recordings.
  4. Sharing verified information regarding this incident on social media and with other affected consumers who have contacted me over the past few days.
  5. Forwarding relevant communication and evidence to media outlets, should the matter remain unresolved.
I emphasize that my concerns relate not only to the non-delivery but also to the serious implications this delay poses, given that the parcel pertains to a health-related matter.
While I do not seek an informal settlement at this stage, I expect an immediate and formal response from your side acknowledging this complaint and providing clarity on the next steps.
Please treat this matter as urgent.
Sincerely,

Kais Kazi

MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S 3 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. notes.body: Hello Ashish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #654730478812372992-58790, I see your order is at the confirmation stage and assigned for a Doctor Teleconsultation.   Our partner doctor tried contacting your multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you. I am arranging a doctor callback on your registered mobile number. You will be receiving a call within 2 hours. I would request you to answer the call so that the order could be processed further. I assure you the order will be processed on priority, once the Doctor consultation is completed.    You can also reach out to us on 080-46161170 for your Doctor Consultation.    Also, your order is estimated to be delivered to you within the timeline of 07th December 2025.    Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.         For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashish,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regards to your order #654730478812372992-58790, I see your order is at the confirmation stage and assigned for a Doctor Teleconsultation.

Our partner doctor tried contacting your multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you. I am arranging a doctor callback on your registered mobile number. You will be receiving a call within 2 hours. I would request you to answer the call so that the order could be processed further. I assure you the order will be processed on priority, once the Doctor consultation is completed. 

You can also reach out to us on 080-46161170 for your Doctor Consultation. 

Also, your order is estimated to be delivered to you within the timeline of 07th December 2025. 

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha
